plot outline: This is the story of the great saint of India, Shirdi Sai Baba. It starts from two immigrants in modern America, one very devotional, one an atheist. It then goes back to Shirdi in the days of the young Sai Baba. The movie teaches Shradda (faith) and Saburi (patience), two main teachings of the saint from India.
title: Shirdi Sai Baba
plot: This is the story of the great saint of India, _Shirdi Sai Baba_ (qv). It starts from two immigrants in modern America, one very devotional, one an atheist. It then goes back to Shirdi in the days of the young Sai Baba. The movie teaches Shradda (faith) and Saburi (patience), two main teachings of the saint from India.::Parsi Zoroastrian
